name: Dene Rohmen: with a vengeance
description:
Watch the gameplay trailer now: A downloadable game for Windows onlyHow to download:

1. Click the Download button

2. Extract the .zip folder

3. Run the .exe file in the extracted folder

You play as Dene Rohmen: a fearless Ninja on his journey for vengeance


Explore three Islands: Grass, Desert, Ice
Find all the key parts scattered across the islands to unlock the fight against the demon that slew your friends!
